errors.error_description: The README incorrectly states that Python 3.6 or higher is required, but the library requires Python 3.8 or higher.
correction_candidates: Change "Python 3.6 or higher is required" to "Python 3.7 or higher is required".
Change "Python 3.6 or higher is required" to "Any version of Python 3 is supported".
Remove the Python version requirement sentence entirely.
Change "Python 3.6 or higher is required" to "Python 3.8 or higher is required".
errors.golden_answer: Change "Python 3.6 or higher is required" to "Python 3.8 or higher is required".
